show.creditText: Posted July 2, 2014 for week ending July 11, 2014

segments.lead-quote: "The larger issues of corporate personhood are probably the things that really most need to be talked about. What is the religious freedom of a corporation; will it go beyond the narrow decision that (Justice) Alito wrote? It seems likely, given that there's so many other issues with the expansion of corporate personhood."
segments.citation: Frederick Clarkson, a senior fellow with Political Research Associates
